name: Lashbrender Demo
description:
Lashbrender Demo!

Lashbrender is one of my favourite games that I have worked on. And its been fun making it and continuing making the full game is even more fun.

Controls:

AD/Arrows to Move

Space to Jump

PSController Accepted (XBOX Controllers and be accepted, just different buttons to jump, and shoot).

SO yeah. If theres any bugs, please email me at info.jabart@gmail.com, and I shall help you. :)

Thanks.
